name: AP.GG
description: Plateforme web d'analyse League of Legends avec focus sur les builds AP
author: AP.GG Team

scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd ap_gg_front_end && npm install && npm run build
scripts.db:reset: cd ap_gg_back_end && php bin/console doctrine:database:drop --force && php bin/console doctrine:database:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
